subject: Tennis
Madrid Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: Rafael Nadal defeated Tomas Berdych, 7-6, 6-1, in a Madrid Open semifinal, which he called “one of the best victories I’ve had in some time.”
snippet: Rafael Nadal defeated Tomas Berdych, 7-6, 6-1, in a Madrid Open semifinal, which he called “one of the best victories I’ve had in some time.”
